title: Google\Cloud\Optimization\V1\Waypoint
name: Waypoint
description:
Encapsulates a waypoint. Waypoints mark arrival and departure locations of VisitRequests, and start and end locations of Vehicles.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.optimization.v1.Waypoint

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.location
params.description: A point specified using geographic coordinates, including an optional heading.

params.name: data.place_id
params.description: The POI Place ID associated with the waypoint.

params.name: data.side_of_road
params.description: Indicates that the location of this waypoint is meant to have a preference for the vehicle to stop at a particular side of road. When you set this value, the route will pass through the location so that the vehicle can stop at the side of road that the location is biased towards from the center of the road. This option works only for the 'DRIVING' travel mode, and when the 'location_type' is set to 'location'.

methods.name: getLocation
methods.description:
A point specified using geographic coordinates, including an optional heading.
